oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We describe here the sugar functionalized beta-cyclodextrin-ferrocene glass slides as fully reversible bacterial biosensors under the influence of external adamantane carboxylic acid. The prototype D-mannose - E. coli ORN 178 and L-fucose - P. aeruginosa interactions serve as a model to illustrate the new approach.
